product_name: Napier Outdoors Sportz SUV 84000 Tent with Screen Room
long_description: What a comfortable way to camp! The Sportz SUV 84000 Tent with Screen Room offers large interior space for the family, a front porch and an awning, plus it attaches directly to your SUV or Minivan.
short_description: What a comfortable way to camp! The Sportz SUV 84000 Tent with Screen Room offers large interior space for the family, a front porch and an awning, plus it attaches directly to your SUV or Minivan.
